name: Sherlock Holmes Club
overview: The adventures of the most famous detective of all time. A fantastic diskette for C/64 containing several cases that will engage our hero. clues, interrogations, tests and, of course... deduction, in the tradition of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, creator of Sherlock Holmes. On the disk I would find two animated ad ventures; the Lancaster case and the Allan Fox case. In addition to the adventure games, there are also two skill games: Grand Prix and Pistol Race
